title: distributed model parallelism
body_html:
Does PyTorch support distributed model parallelism? I divide the model into two parts and run them in different nodes. However, I don't know how to continue the autograd between the two nodes. I think this is a problem about distributed model parallelism. And I didn't find an official or unofficial example show that.

Any one can help me?
